channel.title: Remove/Replace broken links at kicksecure.com
channel.description:
If we view the source code of https://www.kicksecure.com/ page there are: 1- Search for `forums.kicksecure.org` ``` ``` there is no `kicksecure.org`, it should be .com 2- Search for `https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1180410` ``` de-anonymization of Tor onion services ``` URL broken/changed, check if it can be replaced entirely or with archive one. 3- There is no anbox homepage for anbox-kicksecure feature https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Anbox 4- /wiki/Verify_the_Whonix_images -> `https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Verify_the_Whonix_images` -> Doesnt exist ```

Downloads are signed so genuine Whonix releases can be verified.

```

item.title: Remove/Replace broken links at kicksecure.com
item.dc:creator: nurmagoz
item.description:
Awesome!

Note: for https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1180410 link is redirecting
to https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/1180405.1180410 (sometimes it takes
long time to redirect which might show its dead)

So its better to replace it with the direct link for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove/Replace broken links at kicksecure.com
item.dc:creator: nurmagoz
item.description:
If we view the source code of https://www.kicksecure.com/ page there are:

1- Search for forums.kicksecure.org

<a href="https://forums.kicksecure.org" data-modal="modal-explain-community" target="_blank">

there is no kicksecure.org, it should be .com

2- Search for https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1180410

<a target="_blank" class="external text" href="https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1180410">
  de-anonymization of Tor onion services

URL broken/changed, check if it can be replaced entirely or with archive one.

3- There is no anbox homepage for anbox-kicksecure feature

Kicksecure – 4 Nov 22

Anbox

4- /wiki/Verify_the_Whonix_images → https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Verify_the_Whonix_images → Doesnt exist

  <p>
    Downloads are
    <a href="/wiki/Verifying_Software_Signatures">signed</a>
    so genuine Whonix releases can be
    <a href="/wiki/Verify_the_Whonix_images">verified</a>.
  </p>

Read full topic
